description:
The Night Criterium is in its final stages. Using Tomoe`s strategy, Hiromi and Natsumi catch up to Mr. Bear. However, when her shoulder begins hurting even more badly, Natsumi falls behind. Just then, Azuma-senpai catches up after an aggressive attack, and it comes down to a three-way race between Mr. Bear, Hiromi, and Azuma-senpai. Who will achieve victory...?
Source: crunchyroll
